creator: Cendar Analytics
descriptionHtml:
iclass is the best learning App for secondary school students. It is designed to give you a solid educational foundation and help you score higher in JAMB, post JAMB, WAEC and BECE exams.
What’s Contained in the App?
Easy-to-understand video lessons covering the entire NERDC syllabus for Maths, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, English and Economics. These video lessons are taught by some of Nigeria’s best teachers – including Founder and CEO, Ikenna Nwokolo.
Topic-by-topic past Q & A for JAMB, post JAMB, WAEC, BECE and other major exams. Detailed answers are provided to make practicing for these exams an easy ride.
One-on-one chat with Nigeria’s best teachers to help answer any question you may have while preparing for an exam or doing assignments. You get instant solutions to your questions 24/7.
Reports to help you measure how well you’ve understood a topic.

For feedback and support please call +2348157900781.
